      • importFile

        protected void importFile(java.io.File file)
        Import a training file. It has to fulfill this format: [name] [label] [data ... ]. The Whitespaces between the three types are mandatory.
        Parameters:
        file - File which contains the training data

      • stratifiedCrossValidation

        public ExtendedTrial stratifiedCrossValidation(cc.mallet.util.Randoms r,
                                               cc.mallet.types.InstanceList data,
                                               int numFolds,
                                               SentimentClassifierType sentimentClassifierType)
        Uses stratified sampling, to get the best classifier after the training phase
        Parameters:
        r - Random variables
        data - Instance list with data to use during the cross validation
        numFolds - Defines how many folds are executed
        sentimentClassifierType - Defines what classier type to use
        Returns:
        ExtendedTrial to look up the evaluation results
        See Also:
        http://permalink.gmane.org/gmane.comp.ai.mallet.devel/1163
